meanings.definition: A powerful or influential man who exhibits physical strength.
meanings.sent1: The strongman lifted the heavy weights effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The strongman at the circus amazed the audience with his incredible strength.
meanings.sent3: The strongman challenged the elephant to an arm-wrestling match for fun.
meanings.sent4: His determination made him a strongman in the eyes of his peers.
meanings.sent5: The image of the strongman's bulging muscles stayed in everyone's minds.

meanings.definition: A leader or ruler who exercises authoritarian control.
meanings.sent1: The strongman ruled the country with an iron fist.
meanings.sent2: The strongman's strict policies left little room for dissent.
meanings.sent3: The strongman insisted on everyone wearing matching socks on Fridays.
meanings.sent4: His grip on power was that of a strongman holding a scepter.
meanings.sent5: The strongman's gaze alone was enough to silence any opposition.

meanings.definition: A performer in a circus or fair known for feats of strength.
meanings.sent1: The strongman wowed the crowd by bending metal bars with his bare hands.
meanings.sent2: Children lined up to get the strongman's autograph after his show.
meanings.sent3: The strongman juggled elephants while balancing on a tightrope.
meanings.sent4: His muscles rippled like waves as he performed like a true strongman.
meanings.sent5: The strongman's act was the highlight of the entire circus.
